mapper.sql:
SELECT T1.PD_CD AS SVPD_PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL01 AS SVPD_ITEM_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS SVPD_PART_CD , T1.PD_NM AS SVPD_NM_KOR , T1.PD_ABBR_NM AS SVPD_NM_ABBR1 , T1.CST_BASE_PD_ABBR_NM AS SVPD_NM_CUST , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS SVPD_ITEM_KND , T4.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_ITEM_KND_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS SVPD_ITEM_GR , T5.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_ITEM_GR_NM , T1.PD_CLSF_ID AS SVPD_CLSF_ID /*상품분류ID*/ , T1.PD_HCLSF_ID AS SVPD_HCLSF_ID /*상품대분류ID*/ , T1.PD_MCLSF_ID AS SVPD_MCLSF_ID /*상품중분류ID*/ , T1.PD_LCLSF_ID AS SVPD_LCLSF_ID /*상품소분류ID*/ , T1.PD_DCLSF_ID AS SVPD_DCLSF_ID /*상품세분류ID*/ , T1.SELL_TP_CD AS SVPD_SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') >= NVL(t1.RVPY_STRTDT,'19000101') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') <= NVL(t1.RVPY_ENDDT,'99991231') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SVPD_USE_YN , t1.RVPY_STRTDT AS SVPD_APLD_FR , t1.RVPY_ENDDT AS SVPD_APLD_TO , T1.SAP_MAT_CD AS SVPD_SAP_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_GRP_VAL AS SVPD_SAP_GRP , T1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL AS SVPD_SAP_LEVEL , T1.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL AS SVPD_SAP_CLASS , T1.SAP_PDCT_SCLSRT_STRC_VAL AS SVPD_PDCT_CLSS_RSC , T1.PDCT_UPRC AS SVPD_STD_PR , T1.IMG_APN_FILE_ID AS SVPD_IMG_URL , T1.PD_EPL_CN AS SVPD_RMKS , T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS SVPD_COMM_GB , T6.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_COMM_GB_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL04 AS SVPD_LP_GB , T2.PD_PRP_VAL02 AS SVPD_MGT_TYP , T7.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_MGT_TYP_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL10 AS SVPD_SFTY_QTY , T2.PD_PRP_VAL03 AS SVPD_SIZE , T2.PD_PRP_VAL05 AS SVPD_MGT_UNT , T8.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_MGT_UNT_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL06 AS SVPD_LT , T2.PD_PRP_VAL11 AS SVPD_DEL_UNT , T9.CD_CNTN AS SVPD_DEL_UNT_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL12 AS SVPD_BOX_QTY , T2.PD_PRP_VAL13 AS SVPD_PLT_QTY , T2.PD_PRP_VAL14 AS SVPD_BARCODE_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS SVPD_BASE_GB , T2.PD_PRP_VAL16 AS SVPD_BASE_COLOR_GB , T2.PD_PRP_VAL24 AS SVPD_REFUR_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL25 AS SVPD_QTYLMT_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL26 AS SVPD_DISPOSAL_COST , T2.PD_PRP_VAL08 AS SVPD_TOT_WEI , T2.PD_PRP_VAL09 AS SVPD_PLT_WEI , T2.PD_PRP_VAL07 AS SVPD_MOQ , T2.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS SVPD_TURNOVER_TGT , T1.PD_TP_CD AS SVPD_PD_TP_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL22 AS SVPD_BAR_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL23 AS SVPD_BAR_CD_18 , T2.PD_PRP_VAL29 AS SVPD_PICK_QTY , T2.PD_PRP_VAL32 AS SVPD_SERVICE_USE_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL36 AS SVPD_PART_GR , T2.PD_PRP_VAL37 AS SVPD_HMCR_USE_YN
FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T4 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = T4.CD_VLD_VAL AND T4.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T4.CD_ID = 'ITM_KND_CD' AND T4.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T5 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = T5.CD_VLD_VAL AND T5.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T5.CD_ID = 'PD_GRP_CD' AND T5.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T6 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 = T6.CD_VLD_VAL AND T6.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T6.CD_ID = 'CMN_PART_DV_CD' AND T6.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T7 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL02 = T7.CD_VLD_VAL AND T7.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T7.CD_ID = 'MAT_MNGT_DV_CD' AND T7.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T8 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL05 = T8.CD_VLD_VAL AND T8.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T8.CD_ID = 'MNGT_UNIT_CD' AND T8.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_CD_D T9 ON T2.PD_PRP_VAL11 = T9.CD_VLD_VAL AND T9.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T9.CD_ID = 'OSTR_UNIT_CD' AND T9.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
